title.rendered: Critical Questions You Must Ask Your Lash Salon

content.rendered:
Lash extensions are all the rage these days, but many women still seem to be a bit confused about the entire process. Some struggle to get comfortable with the idea or may wonder how they can know whether a given salon is the right one for their needs. Well, the simplest way to feel good about these beauty enhancements is to start asking the right questions. In that spirit, here are some of the top questions that you should be asking your lash salon.

What Type of Adhesive Do You Use?

The most common problem that women report is irritation due to sensitivity to the adhesive used during the application process. While rare, that problem is still one that you want to avoid whenever possible. The easiest way to avoid it is to ask questions before you sit down for your appointment. Ask about the adhesive. Ask about the test they use to ensure that you’re not sensitive to that glue. It’s better to know before you lie down for the appointment, to make sure that you’re all on the same page.

How Do You Do Your Applications?

This is an important question, since it will ultimately determine the look that your extensions achieve. First, remember that these are not falsies that get applied as a group. Your lash application should be done the right way, with each extension carefully glued to one natural lash. That’s the only way to ensure that your natural lashes are not overly burdened, and the best way to ensure that you achieve the full, lush look that you desire.

Can I Customize My Application?

You probably have some idea about the health and strength of your natural lashes. More important, you probably want to convey that information to your lash technician. To do that, you need to know that your salon will listen to your concerns and desires and translate them into positive action during your application. So, always ask whether they can customize their application process to meet your specific needs.

Do You Have Aftercare Products I Can Use?

Many salons carry lash care products for their customers. You should always ask about these, since your lash technician is the best resource available for protecting your lash extensions on a long-term basis. Just ask if they have lash cleansers, mascara, brushes, or any other lash care products that you might be interested in using.

At Ebenezer Eyelash, our lash technicians are committed to providing you with the best eyelash extensions in New York City. Communication is the key to achieving the best results, so we always welcome these conversations with our clients. If course, it is always better to get these answers prior to the appointment, since your technician will need to fully concentrate on your application to provide those perfect lashes you deserve. If you’re ready to get answers to your most pressing lash extension questions, give us a call today. We will be happy to provide the answers you need and get your scheduled for your lash extension appointment.
